title: Ibiza Coastal San Antonio Bay Adults-Only Escape with Live DJs, Pool Club & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Europe’s biggest party town - San Antonio Bay, Ibiza - with a stay at Ryans Lola's, an adults-only coastal escape. This trendy hotel offers a unique blend of both relaxing and electric energy, with stylish rooms and a lively bar beside the central pool. Lounge beneath the Spanish sunshine by the sparkling pool, before sipping a refreshing cocktail and listening to live DJs bring the party to you. Go beyond the hotel to the historic Dalt Vila, the city's UNESCO World Heritage-listed old town, and the bustling marina with its array of chic boutiques and fabulous eateries. For food enthusiasts, nearby Sa Punta des Molí restaurant serves authentic Ibizian cuisine by the sea. You'll also find O Beach Ibiza beach club and pool party hangout just down the road for unforgettable nights of music and dancing.

Book yourself a day of fun in the sun with a full-day boat trip, which is the best way to explore Ibiza and the surrounding islands. Snorkel, scuba, paddle board, or kayak, the choice is yours. Or, for those wanting to stay on dry land, wake up early to trek to Torres d’en Lluc and be rewarded with a dip in the nearby beaches, or catch the sun rising over the ocean from Aguas Blancas Cove on the other side of Ibiza.
offer_address: Carrer de Cantàbria, 14, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears, Spain

vendor_name: Cala San Miguel Hotel Ibiza, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Adults-Only Ibiza Retreat with Mediterranean Sea Views, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktail Voucher
description:
Escape to this five-star adults-only oasis nestled in the enchanting island allure of Ibiza. Relax by the outdoor pools with a refreshing cocktail, where the soothing sound of waves meets breathtaking views of the azure Mediterranean Sea, and embrace well-being at the state-of-the-art fitness centre.

This secluded retreat is tucked away in the vibrant port village of San Miguel, amid the island's rugged beauty and serene landscapes. Located within easy reach of Ibiza's famed attractions, you can experience the rhythmic energy of Cala Benirrás with its sunset drum sessions or venture further to Es Vedrá to marvel at this natural wonder of the world.
location_description: Cala San Miguel Hotel Ibiza, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 26 Puerto San Miguel, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza 07815, Spain

vendor_name: Cala San Miguel Hotel Ibiza, Curio Collection by Hilton

description:
Escape to this five-star adults-only oasis, part of the Curio Collection by Hilton, nestled in the enchanting island allure of Ibiza. Relax by the outdoor pool with a refreshing cocktail, where the soothing sound of waves lapping against pristine beaches is met with breathtaking views of the azure Mediterranean Sea, and embrace wellbeing at the state-of-the-art fitness centre and wellness cabins.

This secluded retreat is tucked away in the vibrant port village of San Miguel, nestled amidst the island's rugged beauty and serene landscapes. Located within easy reach of Ibiza's famed attractions, you can experience the rhythmic energy of Cala Benirrás with its sunset drum sessions or venture further to Es Vedrá to marvel at this natural wonder of the world.
location_description: Cala San Miguel Hotel Ibiza, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 26 Puerto San Miguel, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza 07815, Spain

title: Adults-Only Five-Star Ibiza Beachfront Glamour with Daily Breakfast & All-Inclusive Upgrades Available
description:
Wake to the sound of waves lapping the shore at this five-star oasis on the Spanish island of Ibiza. This beachfront escape redefines Balearic luxury, with everything from butler service to gourmet dining across three exquisite restaurants.

From sandy beaches to hidden coves, Ibiza’s natural beauty is just waiting to be explored from your picture-perfect perch. Spend time with a loved one as you watch the sunset paint the sky from any of the three pools, or sip on signature cocktails at Gravity rooftop bar with friends before hitting the town.

Stroll down to the breathtaking Cala Gració beachfront for a day of sunbathing or try your hand at kayaking around the rugged shoreline. Come dinner time, tuck into contemporary local cuisine at Helios, international favourites at Capricho or the finest cuts of meat at El Gaucho.
offer_address: Camí del Portixol 1, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, Balearic Islands 07820, Spain

title: Grand Opening: Boutique Ibiza Beachfront Escape in Cala Llonga with Daily Breakfast
description:
Be one of the first to experience the famed beauty and nightlife of Ibiza with a tranquil escape just a stone's throw from the island's vibrant Old Town and famous clubs. Here, you can have it all - a relaxed atmosphere by day, and easy access to iconic nightlife by night. Spend your days lounging by one of the pools with a drink in hand, or opt for one of Cala Llonga's pristine beaches before taking a ferry ride or taxi to Playa d'en Bossa or iconic Dalt Vila. Within Cala Llonga Bay, a selection of restaurants and bars means that you don't have to stray far to savour local cuisine and fresh seafood in between discovering the turquoise waters and sandy beaches.

When you're not soaking up the sun at the beach or exploring the island's gems, take some time to enjoy sundowner cocktails at one of the hotel's seven bars and restaurants, each offering a different vibe and blissful surroundings. Indulge in laid-back poolside drinks and small bites at Bungalow, Japanese cuisine at Niko or Mexican margaritas at Cuyo - or why not try a different one each night?
offer_address: 20 Calle Atalaya, Cala Llonga, Illes Balears 07849, Spain

title: Adults-Only Five-Star Ibiza Beachfront Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining, Free-Flow Drinks & Spa Access
description:
Wake to the sound of waves lapping the shore at this five-star, all-inclusive oasis on the Spanish island of Ibiza. This beachfront escape redefines Balearic luxury, with everything from butler service to gourmet dining across exquisite restaurants.

From sandy beaches to hidden coves, Ibiza's natural beauty is just waiting to be explored from your picture-perfect perch. Spend time with a loved one as you watch the sunset paint the sky from the infinity pool, or sip signature cocktails at the Gravity Sky Bar with friends before hitting the town.

Stroll down to the Cala Gració beachfront for a day of sunbathing or try your hand at kayaking around the rugged shoreline. Come dinner time, contemporary local cuisine at Helios; international favourites at Capricho or the finest cuts of meat at El Gaucho.
offer_address: Camí del Portixol 1, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, Balearic Islands 07820, Spain

title: Grand Opening: Ibiza Cliffside Elegance with Two Pools, Direct Beach Access & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover brand-new Mediterranean elegance at this modern cliffside retreat enjoying a serene spot on the eastern coast of Ibiza at Cala Llonga, just metres from the waters of the Balearic Sea. Be among the first to find true serenity in your sophisticated room accented by earthy shades of bone and ochre, then step out to explore the beautiful coastal paradise.

Venture out to feel the thrum of Ibiza's energetic centre just a short drive away, or dine on a delicious Japanese meal at the ambient NIKO Ibiza back at the hotel. Get the quintessential Ibizan experience at CUYO, delivering refreshing cocktails to you as you unwind in paradise.

Featuring signature Mondrian style and service, this contemporary oasis invites you to lounge by two sparkling pools overlooking the coast, all the while indulging in the finer things in life.
offer_address: 20 Calle Atalaya, 20, 07849 Cala Llonga, Balearic Islands, Spain

title: Adults-Only Five-Star Ibiza Beachfront Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining, Free-Flow Drinks & Spa Access
description:
Wake up to the sound of waves lapping the shore at this five-star, all-inclusive oasis on the Spanish island of Ibiza. This beachfront escape redefines Balearic luxury, with everything from butler service to gourmet dining across exquisite restaurants.

From sandy beaches to hidden coves, Ibiza's natural beauty is just waiting to be explored from your picture-perfect perch. Spend time with a loved one as you watch the sunset paint the sky from the infinity pool, or sip on signature cocktails at the Gravity Sky Bar with friends before hitting the town.

Stroll down to the Cala Gració beachfront for a day of sunbathing or try your hand at kayaking around the rugged shoreline. Come dinner time, contemporary local cuisine at Helios; international favourites at Capricho or the finest cuts of meat at El Gaucho.
offer_address: Camí del Portixol 1, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, Balearic Islands 07820, Spain

title: Stylish Five-Star Ibiza Escape with Ocean-View Pool & Sunken Cabanas
description:
Unearth the real charm of this Balearic paradise and treat yourself to a heavenly stay at the five-star Bless Hotel Ibiza, tucked away in the island’s north, just 10 minutes from Santa Eulalia. Renowned for mesmerising sunsets, secluded coves, historic towns, crystal-clear waters and some of the biggest parties in the world, the White Isle has something for everyone - and a stay at this Leading Hotels of the World property is the best way to experience it all. The striking décor is said to be inspired by the timeless elegance of Coco Chanel, with sharp black detail set against a monochromatic palette and subtle pastel hues making a bold statement. Each of the 151 rooms and suites boasts Bose sound systems, ensuites with Le Labo amenities, an elegant oak dressing area and plush bedding to ensure a restful stay.

Choose to fill your days exploring the sights and sounds across the island or find plenty to entertain within the contemporary hotel's grounds. Laze by the ocean-view pool, retreat to the Magness Soulful Spa, sip on a cocktail at the rooftop bar or dine at Etxeko, where 12-Michelin-starred chef Martín Berasategui (the chef with the most Michelin stars in Spain) delivers an haute cuisine tasting menu inspired by the flavours of the Basque region.
offer_address: Playa, Av. Cala Nova, 07849 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

title: Adults-Only Ibiza Island Escape in the Heart of Beach Resort Village Es Caná
description:
Experience the allure of Ibiza from one of the island’s best hotels: the ultra-cool Hotel Paraiso Beach. Ideally located in the scenic oasis of Es Caná, this boutique hotel is perfectly positioned for shopping, sightseeing, and exploring the array of bars, restaurants and entertainment venues the island is so famous for.

The stylish hotel has 72 rooms, smartly designed for the modern traveller, offering Spanish character and contemporary touches, including plush bedding and modern bathrooms with premium amenities. Take a dip in the onsite pool or nearby beach - only 100 metres away - then wine and dine at the hotel restaurant and bar. If it's nightlife you're after, Hotel Paraiso Beach is less than 30 minutes from the island's capital, Ibiza - one of Europe's favourite nightlife playgrounds.
offer_address: Avinguda Punta Arabi, 117, 07840 es Canar, Illes Balears, Spain

title: Blissful Ibiza Oceanfront Luxury with 1,200sqm Wellness Centre
description: In a serene pocket along Ibiza's northern coast, discover a place where luxury and conscious travel meet - Six Senses Ibiza, perched overlooking the crystal-clear Xarraca Bay. Farm-to-table practices can be found at the Beach Caves, a venue built into the rock face overlooking the ocean, where exquisite meals, epic sunsets and live music await. For a treasured tipple, visit Ibiza 500, the onsite wine cellar where master sommeliers have handpicked the best drops from the verdant Ibiza soil for you to sample. When you've had your fill, hide away in wellness center - spanning 1,200 square metres - that features the RoseBar longevity lounge, steam room, hammam, a state-of-the-art fitness area and seafront yoga deck.
offer_address: Camí de Sa Torre, 71, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Illes Balears, Ibiza, Spain

title: Ibiza Barefoot Luxury Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Experience barefoot luxury on the blissful Spanish island of Ibiza with a relaxing escape at Nativo Hotel Ibiza. This ultra-modern, Japanese-inspired hotel is nestled on the east coast of Ibiza in tranquil Santa Eulalia del Rio - a serene and leafy area perfectly positioned next to some of the best beaches on the island. Far from Ibiza's party towns, the white sands and laidback nightlife here attract a calmer kind of traveller. 

Built to embrace the balmy Spanish weather, this stylish island retreat offers incredible outdoor spaces, sweeping timber terraces with plush daybeds and hammocks, three pools, sandy areas for barefoot living, and fragrant gardens, ensuring privacy, tranquility and intimacy. Find rustic charm and a bohemian ambience amid the eco-conscious design of the hotel, honouring natural materials and seasonal, local produce.

With an incredible location a short stroll from the beach, access to a 1,500sqm spa, an ultra-cool rooftop with sweeping views, two restaurants, three pools, and minimalist rooms designed to honour the traditional Japanese aesthetic of wabi-sabi (a world view centred on the acceptance of transience and imperfection), Nativo truly sets the stage for a sun-kissed break on the island of Ibiza.
offer_address: Carrer els Clavells, 24, 07849 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

title: Ibiza Five-Star Beachside Retreat with Rooftop Bar in the Heart of Old Town
description: Experience the vibrant spirit of the Balearic with a stay at Montesol Experimental Ibiza. This bohemian retreat is ideally located in the heart of Ibiza's Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site, with the historic Dalt Vila and bustling Marina Botafoch on its doorstep. Savour the flavours of the Mediterranean at the hotel's acclaimed Café Montesol, unwind with a cocktail at the stylish rooftop bar or explore the island's renowned nightlife scene.
offer_address: Passeig de Vara de Rey, 2, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

title: Iconic Ibiza Art Deco Escape with Rooftop Bar
description:
Book yourself an invite to the hottest party in town with a stay at Ocean Drive Ibiza, an Ibiza icon that boasts beautiful views of the Old Town and Mediterranean. Sitting across from Marina Botafoch, this stylish Art Deco hotel puts the best of the Balearics at your fingertips: a 10-minute walk one way and you’re on the sands of tranquil Talamanca Bay, while 10 minutes in the other direction gets you to the front door of mega-club Pacha.

Ocean Drive Ibiza's classic Art Deco aesthetic takes inspiration from 1920s Miami. Each room and suite is outfitted with tones of lavender and chocolate and views of the Mediterranean or the island’s rugged mountain interior. The best seat in the house is at the rooftop lounge Sky Bar - venture to the hotel’s top level to sip on cocktails and look out to Dalt Vila (Ibiza’s Old Town) and the island of Formentera. Summer sees the bar heaving with partygoers, dancing away to tunes spun by high-profile DJs, while healthy dishes with Latin American and European influences are served in the seasonal restaurant. Come November to April, a calmer crowd calls Ocean Drive Ibiza home, opting for a relaxing and rejuvenating break in the winter sun.
offer_address: Port Deportivo Marina Botafoch, s/n, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain

title: Glamorous Ibiza Boutique Retreat in Upmarket Talamanca
description:
Pack your dancing shoes: it’s time to escape to Ibiza’s Ocean Drive Talamanca. Perched in a quiet seaside location on the sands of Talamanca Bay, this boutique design-led property sits close to all the island's hotspots, making for the perfect balance of party and peace. It’s a 30-minute walk (or five-minute taxi) to Ibiza Town and a 30-second walk to the beach, while regular buses to the mega-clubs of Pacha and Space depart right outside.

Spend your days by one of three pools onsite, lazing on sunloungers and enjoying a concoction or two from the pool bar, while a DJ provides the laidback tunes. When hunger strikes, turn to the light-filled Restaurant, where Asian and Mediterranean flavours fuse for healthy dishes. Over the summer, venture to the Sky Bar, where stunning 360° views of the surrounding landscapes come standard. If you prefer dumbbells over dancing, pop into the fitness centre to work up a sweat, before finding a spot in the airy Lobby Bar for a refreshing cocktail and bite to eat.
offer_address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

title: Five-Star Ibiza Eco-Luxe Spa Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Unlimited Access to Revival Spa by Clarins
description:
Slip into the spirit of Ibiza with a stay by the high-end Marina Santa Eulalia at Aguas de Ibiza, a five-star eco-luxe oasis on the quieter east coast of the island. Tap into the soul of the Mediterranean as you experience a different side to Ibiza, where you can float away in the rooftop swimming pool, sip a cocktail as the sun melts into the sea and find a dose of serenity with unlimited access to the onsite Revival Spa by Clarins. This unique concept has been recognised as the most environmentally friendly boutique hotel on this island, with smart building automation and systems for saving water and energy.

Santa Eulalia del Rio is steadily gaining in popularity for a romantic sojourn or family retreat, and this five-star oasis epitomises the area's up-and-coming style. Part of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, Aguas de Ibiza beckons with authentic Peruvian cuisine at the rooftop Maymanta restaurant, three pools - including an adults-only pool - and a location less than 300m from the beach's golden shores.
offer_address: Carrer Salvador Camacho, 9, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Illes Balears, Spain

title: Ibiza Hilltop Luxury in UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Dalt Vila with Ocean-View Pool
description:
Be immediately transported to a world that feels miles away from the bustling harbourside activity of Ibiza with a serene stay at Hotel La Torre del Canónigo. This sophisticated hilltop abode is set amid the cobbled streets of Dalt Vila - Ibiza’s beguiling Old Town. Wind your way through a labyrinth of 14th-century walls and medieval marvels to reach this grand hotel, steeped in history, where you’ll be treated to sweeping views over the thriving city and marina below. The charming hotel's exterior - comprised of three 16th-century buildings - may be reflective of the city’s past, but the interior showcases a modern flair and energetic spirit perfectly suited to Ibiza’s lively atmosphere. Inside the stylish rooms, exposed stone walls act as the perfect backdrop for plush velvet touches and lavish furnishings.

When you’re ready to step outside your tranquil room, the hotel’s pool is the place to enjoy a refreshing swim with unparalleled views that stretch across the Mediterranean below. Or visit Corsario Restaurant & Terrace to watch the sun go down and the city come to life at night.
offer_address: Carrer de Joan Roman, 1, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

title: Boho-Chic Ibiza Escape near Cala Llonga Beach with Seven Restaurants & Bars
description:
Laidback luxury meets Ibiza's iconic island energy at this stylish retreat, nestled in the vibrant heart of Cala Llonga. Hyde Ibiza features three shimmering pools, seven eclectic dining venues-including Cuyo, Niko, Bungalow, Sonrojo, and Sun & Moon-and direct access to the serene sands of Cala Llonga Beach, providing the perfect balance of relaxation and adventure.

Guests can indulge in creative culinary experiences, lounge by the pool with a cocktail in hand, or explore Ibiza’s renowned nightlife and cultural treasures just moments away. Whether you're seeking a sun-soaked getaway or an exciting island adventure, Hyde Ibiza delivers an effortlessly cool stay in one of Europe’s most beloved destinations.
offer_address: 20 Calle Atalaya, Cala Llonga, Balearic Islands, Ibiza, 07849, Spain
